Summary Note:
The RM met  Joséphine Camille Moreau at a yacht party in Paris. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
 Joséphine Camille Moreau is a 43 year old and comes from France.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Joséphine Camille Moreau has been happily married to Boucher since 2007. Their children are named Lemaître, Marchand and Fournier.
Education Background:
Joséphine completed her secondary education at Lycée Victor Hugo in 2001.
 Joséphine finished her studies at IUT de Lyon in 2004.
Occupation History:
Joséphine Camille Moreau is a 43 year old CEO from France.
At Thales S.A.,  Joséphine Camille Moreau held the position of Software Developer from 2005 to 2007, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Startup Founder at STMicroelectronics S.A. in 2009, further expanding her skill set.
At STMicroelectronics S.A., she worked as a CEO from 2014 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 330000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3450000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 4190000 EUR from her grandfather, a respected Neurosurgeon, in 2013, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have  Joséphine as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
